text: George Joseph Herriman (August 22, 1880 – April 25, 1944) was an American cartoonist. He is best known for his comic strip Krazy Kat (1913–1944). ==References== *McDonnell, Patrick; O'Connell, Karen; Havenon, Georgia Riley de (1986). Krazy Kat: The Comic Art of George Herriman. Harry N. Abrams. . Category:1880 births Category:1944 deaths Category:American cartoonists Category:American comics artists
title: George Herriman
